title: Launch of Corps Database
description: Created a searchable corps directory with score, show, and championships data. First iteration is 60 ensembles including all current DCI Open and World Class corps.

title: Data Cleanup 2015-2025
description: Added a map view function to the Corps search page and a calendar view function to the Scores History page.

title: Data Cleanup 2009-2014
description: Cleaned and validated all score data for DCA and DCI corps from 2009-2014. Began adding Event Names to score data to better serve data to site functions.

title: 2025 Score Data Updated
description: Added score and biographic data from 8/8 and 8/9.

title: New Site Sections
description: Created framework for Corps and Records sections. Populated Corps information with 29 current and inactive ensembles.

title: Continued Logo Restoration
description: Updated logo directory with 25 new DCI, DCA, and VFW/AL corps logos restored from historical images

title: Data Cleanup 2015-2025
description: Cleaned and validated all score data for DCA and DCI corps from 2015-Present

title: Test Site Live!
description: Uploaded draft site files to GitHub Repo for live testing

title: 2025 Score Data Updated
description: Compiled and added 2025 scores through August 3

title: Head-to-Head Tool
description: Added the head-to-head corps comparison tool, allowing users to compare the head-to-head results between any two corps from 1964 to 2025

title: Scores+ Analytics Added
description: Added Score+ calculation algorithm and visualization for year-to-year score comparisons

title: Scores History
description: Added a searchable score history database for DCI, DCA, and some VFW/AL competitions from 1964 to present
